title: Akana Hotels and Suites
about: Akana Hotels and Suites has spacious, beautiful rooms that are fully air conditioned. They are well furnitured to cause great delight and relaxation with all sorts of amenities for our customers.
caution: Cancellation policy applies. Pets not allowed. Children and Babies allowed.
features: Security, adequate parking, air conditioning, king sized bed, refrigerator, television, in house dining, sofa, wardrobe, study desk, generator set, bathtub.
packages: Economy Delight, Classic DE'Eval, Akana Standard, Akana Royal Lodge, Double Suite.
